title: Boris Johnson: we can leave EU on 31 October without breaking law – video
text:
Boris Johnson insists he will obey the law, but remains ‘confident’ of leaving the EU on 31 October.

Speaking at a tour of a hospital in Essex, the prime minister again labelled the opposition law to prevent a no-deal Brexit a ‘surrender act’ despite facing fierce criticism for his divisive tone in recent days.

Johnson added that the only way to take the ‘heat and anxiety’ out of the Brexit debate was to exit the EU before November.

• No-deal Brexit will be fault of UK government alone, says Juncker
description: Boris Johnson insists he will obey the law, but remains ‘confident’ of leaving the EU on 31 October
